agADQLkey.name: FROM
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Table to be queried.
agADQLkey.agADQLxample: FROM usnob1.0 AS u Note that an alias must be given using AS.

agADQLkey.name: AS
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Specifies a short alias for the table.

agADQLkey.name: WHERE
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Selection condition: logical expression involving columns and constants.
agADQLkey.agADQLxample: WHERE proper_motion < 100 AND vmag BETWEEN 15 and 20

agADQLkey.name: SELECT
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: columns or expressions to select: * denotes all, t.col is a particular column of table-alias t.
agADQLkey.agADQLxample: SELECT t.ra,t.dec,t.vmag FROM usnob AS t

agADQLkey.name: TOP
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Selects first N rows from the table.
agADQLkey.agADQLxample: SELECT * FROM usnob AS t FIRST 15

agADQLkey.name: XMATCH
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Cross-match with another table to a given significance level
agADQLkey.agADQLxample: XMATCH(3.5, t2) -- matches with table t2 for positions up to 3.5 sigma away

agADQLkey.name: REGION
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Selects region of the sky (circle, rectangle, etc)

agADQLkey.name: LeftParenthesis
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Left parenthesis

agADQLkey.name: RightParenthesis
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Right parenthesis

agADQLkey.name: PLUS
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: The addition operator (binary) or the positive number indicator

agADQLkey.name: MINUS
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: The subtraction operator (binary) or the negative number sign

agADQLkey.name: TIMES
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: The multiplication operator, or a wildcard denoting all

agADQLkey.name: OVER
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Division operator

agADQLkey.name: EQUALS
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Conditional equals to

agADQLkey.name: NOTEQUAL
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Conditional not equal to

agADQLkey.name: LESSTHAN
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Conditional less than

agADQLkey.name: LESSTHANEQUAL
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Conditional less than or equal to

agADQLkey.name: GREATERTHAN
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Conditional greater than

agADQLkey.name: GREATERTHANEQUAL
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Conditional greater than or equals to

agADQLkey.name: AND
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Logical And

agADQLkey.name: OR
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Logical OR

agADQLkey.name: NOT
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Logical negation

agADQLkey.name: SINE
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Trigonometric sine of angle in radians.

agADQLkey.name: ARCSINE
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Trigonometric arc-sine, result in radians

agADQLkey.name: COSINE
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Trigonometric cosine of angle in radians.

agADQLkey.name: ARCCOSINE
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Trigonometric arc-cosine, result in radians.

agADQLkey.name: TAN
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Trigonometric tangent of angle in radians.

agADQLkey.name: COT
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Trigonometric co-tangent (1/tan) of angle in radians.

agADQLkey.name: ARCTANGENT
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Trigonometric arcTangent result in radians (-pi/2 to pi/2)

agADQLkey.name: ATAN2
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Trigonometric arcTangent result in radians (0 to 2*pi)

agADQLkey.name: ABS
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Absolute value, i.e. negative values turned positive

agADQLkey.name: CEILING
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Rounds up to next whole number

agADQLkey.name: FLOOR
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Rounds down to a whole number

agADQLkey.name: EXP
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Exponentiation

agADQLkey.name: LOG
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Natural logarithm (base e)

agADQLkey.name: LOG10
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Logarithm to base 10.

agADQLkey.name: POWER
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Raises a number to a power.

agADQLkey.name: SQUARE
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Squares a number

agADQLkey.name: SQRT
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Takes square-root

agADQLkey.name: MIN
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Aggregate function to find minimum of a column
agADQLkey.agADQLxample: SELECT MIN(vmag), MAX(vmag) FROM table AS t WHERE ...

agADQLkey.name: AVG
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Aggregate function to find average ignoring null values
agADQLkey.agADQLxample: SELECT AVG(exposure) FROM table AS t

agADQLkey.name: MAX
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Finds maximum value of a column
agADQLkey.agADQLxample: SELECT MIN(vmag), MAX(vmag) FROM table AS t WHERE ...

agADQLkey.name: SUM
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Sums values in a column
agADQLkey.agADQLxample: SELECT SUM(exposure) FROM table AS t WHERE ...

agADQLkey.name: BETWEEN
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Tests for value within a given range
agADQLkey.agADQLxample: SELECT * FROM table AS t WHERE mag BETWEEN 13 AND 25

agADQLkey.name: PI
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Returns value of constant pi

agADQLkey.name: DEGREES
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Converts angle from radians to degrees

agADQLkey.name: RADIANS
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Converts angle from degrees to radians

agADQLkey.name: DISTINCT
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Specifies that duplicate rows are to be ignored
agADQLkey.agADQLxample: SELECT DISTINCT ident FROM mytable AS t WHERE ...

agADQLkey.name: GROUPBY
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Specifies a grouping over an integer/string value
agADQLkey.agADQLxample: SELECT COUNT(FLOOR(mag)), FLOOR(mag) FROM mytable AS t GROUP BY FLOOR(mag)

agADQLkey.name: ORDERBY
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Sorts output rows by some column or expression
agADQLkey.agADQLxample: SELECT * FROM mytable AS t ORDER BY vmag DESC

agADQLkey.name: ASC
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Specifies sort order as ascending

agADQLkey.name: DESC
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Specifies sort order as descending

agADQLkey.name: ROUND
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Function to round to nearest integer (up or down)

agADQLkey.name: TRUNCATE
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: take the integer part of a real number

agADQLkey.name: LIKE
agADQLkey.agADQLxplain: Comparison operator for string variables
